detaileddescription.para:
Source
RoutineControl.c Revision
#6 Author
uif52490 Date
2021/12/8 Routine Control module handles 0x31 request by verifying its conditions and invoking specific functions for each routine. Contains also informations about routine states Include own header file RoutineControl.h in the testcase file (SWATT). Add software requirement IDs in the testcases. Expected test coverage (100%) and type of test coverage is C1.
